children.content:
Hey everybody, it's me, finch!
Today I'm going to be talking a bit about ceremony- what is it, why do it, and who is doing it!

Ceremony is a broad topic and it's something that we, as humans have been doing since before written history. But ceremony is an act that is not dead - it's still living and many people develop and practice new ceremonies and rituals all the time.

I believe that ceremony is a way of deepening our connection to a chosen cosmology. It orients us physically to a set of symbols and ideas so that we embody these ideas and take them with us in our lives
- Some cosmologies only give a few tools to understand experiences - like christianity only having an up and down
- more complex cosmologies have many shades to understand experiences, like Nia's recurring 11 point cosmology

We will talk to Teagan, a healer and ritual worker, who holds cacao and fire ceremonies handed to her from lineage traditions.

We will talk to Nia, a chaos magician who has created their own Cosmology and associated ritual set

And we will discuss the fundamental aspects of ceremony

## Fundamental ceremonial aspects
- direction
- time
- offerings
- sound and movement
- understanding the meaning of each action and symbol
